definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="item_animation"><field name="name">CUSTOM:BookOfDragonsA</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">abrindo2</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_logic_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fechando</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="stop_item_animation"><field name="name">CUSTOM:BookOfDragonsA</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><next><block type="item_animation"><field name="name">CUSTOM:BookOfDragonsA</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">aberto</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
